biotools.summary: proGenomes is a database providing consistent taxonomic and functional annotations for 87,920 bacterial and archaeal genomes belonging to over 12,000 species. These can be interactively explored and downloaded, whereby subsets can be customized, e.g. taxonomic clades, representatives of each species or habitat-specific organisms.

bioschemas.name: proGenomes
